      private SerialPort serPort - The serial port connection with the Arduino

      private static final List USUAL_PORTS - List of the usual serial ports that the Arduino will connect to.

      public method sendImageSize - sends the image size index to set the camera settings - the default setting is 1600 X 1200 0 - 160 X 120 1 - 176 X 144 2 - 320 X 240 3 - 352 X 288 4 - 640 X 480 5 - 800 X 600 6 - 1024 X 786 7 - 1280 X 1024 8 - 1200 X 1600

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public boolean connect()
        public method connect - looks for a valid serial port with an Arduino board connected. If it is found, it's opened and a listener is added, so everytime a line is returned the stringProperty is set with that line. For that a StringBuilder is used to store the chars and extract the line content whenever '\r' or '\n' is found.
        Returns:
        boolean connected - true if there was an Arduino is found and connection is established

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        public method disconnect - method will remove the listener then check to see if the serial port is still connected. If it is still connected then the port will be closed

      • getFileNames

        public void getFileNames()
        public method getFileNames() - gets the names of the files that are stored on the sd card that is attached to the Arduino. Then stores them in a string array to be used to create files during the file transfer.

      • printFileNames

        public void printFileNames()
        public method printFileNames - This method prints the file names to the Console. The method is used priamarly for troubleshooting and is mainly used only in development.

      • downloadFiles

        public void downloadFiles()
        public method downloadFiles- Takes the file names that are stored in the ArrayList of file names and asks the Arduino to send the files through the Serial port. Each of the files will be created and be written to in the order that the file exist in the Arduino.

      • getImageFileNames

        public ArrayList<String> getImageFileNames()

      • setSaveLocation

        public void setSaveLocation(String location)
        public method setSaveLocation - sets the save location for the images to be saved to the computer
        Parameters:
        location -

      • getSaveLocation

        public String getSaveLocation()
        public method getSaveLocation - gets the save location of the imgaes to be saved to the computer
        Returns:
        The string path of the save location

      • sendImageSize

        public void sendImageSize(int index)
        public method sendImageSize - sends the image size index to set the camera settings - the default setting is 1600 X 1200 0 - 160 X 120 1 - 176 X 144 2 - 320 X 240 3 - 352 X 288 4 - 640 X 480 5 - 800 X 600 6 - 1024 X 786 7 - 1280 X 1024 8 - 1200 X 1600
        Parameters:
        index -

      • sendDelayTime

        public void sendDelayTime(int delayTime)
        public method sendDelayTime - sends the delay time to the Arduino to set the delay time between the image captures
        Parameters:
        delayTime - - the delay time between captures

      • active

        public void active()
        public method active - will set the camera active and inactive - will be used when down loading images from the camera
